entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:52 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:52 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
